issue.title: [Plasma] Add support for Plasma Client to put/get raw bytes without pyarrow serialization.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3504](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3504). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a feature enables Java Client to read data that python client puts .

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3504?focusedCommentId=16650776) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
